revised_title: Fundamental Research in India: A Historical Overview of Physical Sciences
tldr: The author provides a historical overview of modern scientific research in India, focusing on the development of physical sciences research institutions and notable achievements in the field. The article highlights the contributions of Indian scientists and the influence of foreign scientists like P.M.S. Blackett, who played a significant role in promoting research in India.
